overview: Hell week has never been such fun! When the new pledges and frat brothers mix members, seminal fireworks explode. Sexy Brit Matt Windsor gets the cook's tour of Michael Brawn's art studio then drives his long john silver into Michael's sculpted buns. Or see buff blond Chris Ladd manhandle his big 10-incher in the blazing sun. And talk about jobs well done, see 3 beefy power tools go into overload in a workshop. Fresh-faced pledge Sean Cannon wrap lips around Michael's thick joint as Bill Crane drills deep into his tight behind.
title: The Rites of Manhood
